titles.title: Veterans Burial Benefits Improvement Act of 2000
To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the allowance for burial and funeral expenses of certain veterans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: 2/16/2000--Introduced. Veterans Burial Benefits Improvement Act of 2000 - Increases from $300 to $1,000 the authorized allowance for burial and funeral expenses for deceased veterans who: (1) at the time of death were in receipt of veterans' disability compensation or veterans' pension benefits; or (2) were veterans of any war or were discharged or released from active military service for a service- connected disability and for whom there is no next of kin or sufficient resources to cover funeral and burial costs.
